content.text: How do I start building on Celo?

First thing: get your local dev setup ready. I recommend Hardhat + Metamask + Alfajores testnet. Then dive into Celo Composer or start a Clean Code Friday repo. The community is helpful‚Äîask, learn, build. Purpose before profit. Africa‚Äôs got space for your idea, trust me.
What‚Äôs the key to building a solid dev community?

Start with empathy. People join for code but stay for care. Teach, listen, showcase their wins. Whether you‚Äôre in Nairobi or Lagos, it‚Äôs the same‚Äîbuilders need mentorship, momentum, and mission. Show up. Share. Stick around.

Because trust and transparency are rare here. Blockchain lets us rewire broken systems‚Äîland, health, money. It's not about buzzwords. It‚Äôs about building systems that work where the old ones failed. And we have the talent. We just need platforms and belief.

Legacy. I want to know that someone launched their first dApp because I mentored them. That a hackathon project became a real startup. That we didn‚Äôt just copy Silicon Valley‚Äîwe grew our own jungle. I stay for the people. I stay because this is bigger than tech.
